package.description:
SPECTACLES is a left- and right-recursive acronym for
SPECTACLES: Pertaining to Electronic Computer-Trained Algorithms for Classification and Learning, Etc.; SPECTACLES
It's just a space for me to hack around in to get a more solid understanding of what computer vision is really doing, rather than just tinkering with already-implemented algorithms which I don't really understand at a fundamental level.
package.author: Morgan Quigley
